raw_body: JAYAMANNA – DAYANTHI NELUNNIKA – Dearly beloved daughter of late Q.M.R. Jayamanna (Attorney-at-Law) and late Agnes Jayamanna (nee Tudugalle),​ loving sister of Kanchani,​ darling Punchiamma of Githani,​ expired. Cortege leaves residence at 2.00 p.m. for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Kanatte at 3.00 p.m. 35,​ Sagara Road,​ Colombo 04.021021
